author: lgo
msg: The Buildbot master configuration + customization files.
Note 1: these are the actual files, no cleanup of extra comments added.
Note 2: changes made to these files are *not* automatically propagated
* tools/buildbot/master/master.cfg: The configuration of the buildbot master.
the file containing private information (paths, passwords).
mails in the correct format to the svn-breakage list.
* tools/buildbot/master/Feeder.py: RSS+ATOM feeds. This has been
integrated upstream in later versions of buildbot.

author: hwright
msg: Replace a couple of calls to svn_wc_create_tmp_file2() with stream equivalents.
(svn_wc_add_repos_file4): Use the unique stream functions to remove calls

author: gstein
msg: Document that we are now disallowing NULL values for parameters to the
svn_wc_ensure_adm() family, contrary to previously-published docstrings.
This adds an API Errata to document the change.
(init_adm): reorder and rename the UUID param
(svn_wc_add4): reorder params in call to internal_ensure_adm
(svn_wc_ensure_adm3): if the params are NULL, then return an error.

author: lgo
msg: to store the buildbot master configuration.
